about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the sounds of swamp noir with this specially packaged EP for Act 1: Wonderland. Composed by Chris Wilson and Steve Pardo of SkewSound, the original soundtrack embodies the uncertainty and secrets awaiting to be revealed through game's three acts. This 7-track EP gives you the full musical experience:
  • Main theme
  • Romana (Dirt)
  • Romana Song 2
  • Bellet (Long Drag)
  • Gaddis (Burnt Offerings)
  • Radio Song 1
  • Chase Song

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: i3 or equirvalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/512 MB RAM with OpenGL 3 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/512 MB RAM with OpenGL 3 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Act 1 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or NVidia card w/512 MB RAM with OpenGL 3 support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
